professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in database management, performance tuning, backup and recovery processes, high availability, and disaster recovery solutions. Proficient in T-SQL, SSMS, SSIS, SSRS, and other related tools. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail in maintaining database health and integrity.

key_responsibilities: and monitored SQL Server 2008 and 2012 instances.
Configured performance tuning and optimization for SQL Server.
Implemented backup and recovery processes using maintenance plans and T-SQL.
Involved in SQL Server upgrade from 2008 to 2012.
Designed and configured failover clustering and log shipping for critical databases.
Performed data migration using BCP and SSIS.
Monitored SQL Agent jobs and trending database growth.
Ensured database maintenance jobs and consistency checks.
Implemented performance tuning for slow-running queries.

SQL Server Administration",
            "Database Management",

additional_information.achievements: Experienced DBA with a strong track record of solving complex database issues and improving database performance.
